content: Pepes of the Galaxy Game 🌌🎮Introduction 🚀Pepes of the Galaxy is a unique, whimsical, and engaging decentralized game set in the infinite cosmos. Join the Pepes, a species evolved on the vibrant planet Peponia, each with unique attributes and quirky accessories.The Game Mechanics 🕹️Experience a game built on smart contracts that define the rules and interactions within the game universe:PepesOfTheGalaxyToken.sol: The in-game currency, Pepenite (PEPEOG). Earn, stake, and wager these tokens.PepesOfTheGalaxyNFT.sol: Manages unique Pepe Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs).PepesOfTheGalaxyLaunchPool.sol: Stake BNB and ETH to be eligible for the fair launch of PEPEOG tokens.PepesOfTheGalaxyBattle.sol: Engage in battles and wager PEPEOG tokens.PepesOfTheGalaxyNFTStaking.sol: Stake Pepe NFTs for PEPEOG tokens.Token Economics 💰PEPEOG tokens are central to the game, used for staking, battles, and governance. The token launch is fair, with no tokens to the team, ensuring an even playing field.Token Model 📊The PEPEOG token allocation ensures sustainability and equitable distribution; a total of 888,000,000 PEPEOG will be minted as the capped supply. Allocation CategoryPercentagePurposeLockupsIn Game Rewards40%Player rewards: staking, battles, incentives.No lockupDevelopment Fund20%Ongoing development and enhancements.Linear release over 2 yearsMarketing and Partnerships10%Marketing campaigns and partnerships.6-month cliff, then release over 18 monthsLaunchpool10%Staking BNB/ETH to get PEPEOG from launchpool.No lockupLiquidity Provision10%Liquidity in decentralized exchanges.No lockupAirdrops and Community Initiatives10%Airdrops, community engagement.No lockupGameplay 🎲Embark on a journey to claim a place in the galaxy, based on an ancient prophecy. Participate by staking PEPEOG tokens and Pepe NFTs, engage in battles, and level up your Pepes.Development Roadmap 🛣️Over the next 12 months, expect exciting milestones including the PEPEOG token launch, Pepe NFT sales, new battle arenas, governance modules, and more.PepesOfTheGalaxy Smart Contracts 🌌🚀Explore the technical side with our smart contracts:PepesOfTheGalaxyToken Smart Contract 🪙: ERC20 token with ownership and transfer restrictions.PepesOfTheGalaxyLaunchPool Smart Contract 🏊‍♂️: Stake BNB/ETH to get tokens at the fair launch.Conclusion 🎉Join us in Pepes of the Galaxy, a game that combines NFTs, DeFi, and thrilling battles. Be part of a transparent, fair, and secure gaming world.
